name: Chemistry
description: Within Physical sciences (under Natural Sciences), Chemistry is the study of substances, their elements, composition, properties, and how they react and change when combined or subjected to different conditions.

name: Inorganic chemistry
description: The branch of chemistry concerned with the properties and behavior of inorganic compounds, which include metals, minerals, and organometallic compounds.

name: Organic chemistry
description: The study of the structure, properties, composition, reactions, and preparation of carbon-containing compounds, which include not only hydrocarbons but also compounds with any number of other elements.

name: Physical chemistry
description: The branch of chemistry concerned with the application of the techniques and theories of physics to the study of chemical systems.
